HDG.FS.content: Heidegger calls analysis of temporality of Dasein a non-metaphysical thinking of time > time no longer series of now moments, but horizon for understanding of being > analytic of Dasein provides equipment making possible sense of being in non-metaphysical signification: destruction achieves its goal (ihr Ziel gebracht) [?????]—but, various coverings of originary sense of being maintain essential relation to what they cover over, so that metaphysics can be read positively, transformations of original meaning all belonging to single destiny—Seinsgeschick
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Heidegger calls analysis of temporality of Dasein a non-metaphysical thinking of time > time no longer series of now moments, but horizon for understanding of being > analytic of Dasein provides equipment making possible sense of being in non-metaphysical signification: destruction achieves its goal (ihr Ziel gebracht) [?????]—but, various coverings of originary sense of being maintain essential relation to what they cover over, so that metaphysics can be read positively, transformations of original meaning all belonging to single destiny—Seinsgeschick

HDG.OHF.content: [series of historical quotes on (Christian) concept of “Man” (Paul, Tatian, Augustine, Aquinas, Zwingli, Calvin, Scheler)] Scheler: man is intention/gesture of transcendence itself, gateway for grace, theo-morphism, an X which is finite/living image of God [Heidegger proclaims: “clear enough: a panorama! a picture, a story (Roman)!”] > Scheler ruins both theology/philosophy: a method of looking away (Hinwegsehens) from facticity
